problem.title: The Content Creation Dilemma
problem.subtitle: Content marketing isn't working like it used to. The landscape has changed, but many teams haven't adapted.
problem.resultSubtitle: Wasted budget, missed opportunities, and stalled growth.

cards.title: Only 5.7% of Content Ranks
cards.description: Most blog posts never reach the first page of Google, making the vast majority of your content investment a wasted effort.

cards.title: Time-Intensive Process
cards.description: The average blog post takes 4+ hours to create, and even longer when you factor in SEO research and optimization.

cards.title: Disconnected Workflows
cards.description: Most teams use 4+ different tools for ideation, writing, SEO, and publishing, creating inefficient workflows and lost insights.

solution.title: The All-in-One SEO Content Platform
solution.subtitle: RankWell brings together every step of the content creation process into a single, streamlined workflow.

steps.title: Identify Trending Topics
steps.description: Our AI scans the web to identify trending topics in your industry and analyzes search patterns to uncover high-potential keywords with lower competition.

steps.title: Generate SEO-Optimized Content
steps.description: RankWell's AI generates comprehensive, factually accurate blog posts built around your target keywords, following proven SEO frameworks.

steps.title: Optimize & Analyze
steps.description: Get real-time SEO scores and actionable recommendations to improve your content's ranking potential before you publish.

steps.title: Publish & Track
steps.description: Push content directly to WordPress, HubSpot, or export to your CMS. Then track performance to continuously improve your strategy.

solution.llmInstructions: This is the solution section that presents the product as the answer to the problems described in the previous section.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about RankWell's AI-powered content platform.
faq.contactText: Still have questions? We're here to help.

items.question: How does RankWell's AI generate content that actually ranks?
items.answer: RankWell's AI is trained on millions of high-performing blog posts and continuously analyzes Google's ranking factors. It combines this knowledge with real-time trend data and SEO best practices to create content that's specifically structured to rank well. We focus not just on keyword density, but also semantic relevance, content structure, readability, and other factors that impact search rankings.

items.question: Is the content original and free from plagiarism?
items.answer: Absolutely. All content generated by RankWell is 100% original and passes plagiarism checks. Our AI creates unique content for each request, and we have built-in safeguards to ensure originality. We also provide built-in plagiarism checking tools so you can verify the uniqueness before publishing.

items.question: Can I customize the content to match my brand voice?
items.answer: Yes. RankWell allows you to define your brand voice parameters, including tone, style, and language preferences. The Growth and Pro plans also include the ability to train the AI on your existing content to more closely match your specific voice and terminology.

items.question: How accurate is the factual information in the generated content?
items.answer: RankWell prioritizes factual accuracy by cross-referencing information from multiple trusted sources. For specific statistics or technical information, the platform will suggest including citations to authoritative sources. You always have the ability to review and edit any information before publishing.

items.question: Can RankWell integrate with my existing content management system?
items.answer: Yes. RankWell offers direct integration with popular CMS platforms including WordPress, HubSpot, Shopify, and more. For other platforms, you can easily export content in multiple formats including HTML, Markdown, and plain text. The Pro plan includes API access for custom integrations.

items.question: What happens after my 14-day free trial ends?
items.answer: At the end of your 14-day trial, you can choose to subscribe to any of our plans to continue using RankWell. We'll send you a reminder before your trial expires, but we don't automatically enroll you in a paid plan - that choice is entirely yours. If you decide not to continue, you can export any content you've already created.

faq.llmInstructions: This is the FAQ section that answers common questions about the product.
